html:
8.30.18  5:38 am   what do you think of the idea of someone working as hard as you are every day but instead of making videos/music they are instead trying as hard as they can to save all of humanity

     there are many ways to save all of humanity

8.30.18  4:44 am   Hi have you ever tried a crumpet 

     yes but i failed

8.30.18  3:07 am   did you use views or other external feedback on your early videos to guide your work

     absolutely not, that's a trap

      or was it mostly internal self evaluation of the content

     fuck that, evaluate a new thing, while doing it

8.30.18  2:56 am   which 'music related meme' youtube channels do you watch?

     none

     any favourites?

8.30.18  2:21 am   my dad got a peavey nathan calaveri international series (i think thats the model as that's what it says on the headstock) from a friend of his for me but i cant find it on google anywhere apart from cash converters. do you know if it's a decent guitar?

     that is not my area of expertise

8.30.18  1:40 am   Did you expect your "history of..." videos to get as popular as they did?

     i had reason to suspect it, (the second one especially) but you can never guarantee these things

8.30.18  1:38 am   you mention congress in hello sexy pants. Was there any event you were alluding to?

     probably relates to all the care-free pants frolicking going on, just a few bars before. that is assumedly what congress was up in arms about, in that context

      Such as the shutdown of the white house?

     no

      When did you write those lyrics?

     may 6, 2018

      Because I know La de da is 10 years old

     some of the first verse was written 10 years ago, but the chorus was written 6 years ago and the rest of it was written immediately before recording it in 2017

8.30.18  12:30 am   are u still having trouble with twitch because i am very excited for the Cool Content that you will put on there

     need a second computer

8.29.18  11:47 pm   Do your songs and lyrics have meaning?

     you'll have to listen and see

      By meaning, more than the literal translations of your lyrics...

     they're meant for the song

      Or are those just mediums in which you use to create a feeling? As in... you use phrases or words, incoherent or not, to create a feeling.

     meaningful feeling, and feelingful meaning

      Or is there another goal?

     i can hardly think of anything more important than feelingful meaning

8.29.18  11:30 pm   Hi bill I just got back to school after a long year and I can't seem to find or talk to my friends. Every time I try to approach them I just get scared or say something awkward instead of being sociable. How do I be a better friend so we stay in touch?

     the cure for awkwardness is tasks and activities

8.29.18  11:08 pm   Your pants fit really well, tips on where to buy your pants?

     fitting and unfitting pants are available almost everywhere. the weird thing is you will absolutely never know until you have tried them and sometimes you still won't know

8.29.18  10:46 pm   how do i get to know people better? there are some cool people that i know are cool but i don't know them well

     go on some kind of adventure with them where you have to think strategically together

8.29.18  10:36 pm   am i weird for not liking fruit

     it is weird to like or dislike fruit

8.29.18  9:55 pm   you can't convince me that you're not @spy_tips

     i think i could

8.29.18  9:28 pm   is it just me or is music getting better and better all the time

     that would make sense

8.29.18  9:12 pm   What are some little things in music that instantly win you over the moment you hear them?

     a little finesse could do it

8.29.18  9:03 pm   How do you get people to both love and fear you but love you slightly more than they fear you?

     become powerful yet generous

8.29.18  8:50 pm   why do you think a sizeable chunk of your audience here seems to struggle with forcing themselves to do work? I fall within that category of people, and it's both strange and refreshing to see others in my situation also here, asking you questions.

     unfairly i can manipulate how sizable the chunk looks depending on which questions i answer

8.29.18  8:36 pm   modern wheat is generally harmful to humans and should be avoided by most people. thoughts? 

     sounds like it would make a good weapon

8.29.18  8:27 pm   What led you to decide to write a brand new song even though you are in time-crunch mode,

     it was a much more assured way to get something that is the appropriate choice for right now

      and can you tell us anything about the process of writing it in what i imagine was a relatively short time? 

     i first tried to write it at a more 'normal' pace, and i couldn't seem to confirm anything beyond the first 2 lines, for an entire day. then i suddenly took control of my life and everything is different now

8.29.18  7:45 pm   Someone I was close to told me to never contact them ever again. What do?

     either they don't want to be close to you or they do want to be close to after first making you feel bad

(: ?

     adventure

     qwerty

man

8.29.18  7:33 pm   everything seems so pointless and i keep grinding my teeth. how does this make you feel

     i think if you thought everything is pointless you would be more relaxed. what you're talking about seems more like a symptom of anxiety, which is when you get stressed from how big of a point everything is

8.29.18  7:23 pm   A lot of people said you had/have depression. Is that true?

     no

8.29.18  7:13 pm   How do I remember my locker code?

     write it down somewhere but you won't need it after the 2nd or 10th time

8.29.18  6:39 pm   How do you forget how a song goes so that you can re-experience it?

     refrain from listening to it for longer than the amount of time you've known it

8.29.18  6:34 pm   well crap i literally only listen to the same few songs over and over and that's all i listen to...... i feel like i'm going to ruin the songs for not only me but others too, i voice chat with my friends a lot and sometimes we play music but I CAN'T PLAY ANY MUSIC I LIKE BECAUSE I'VE ALREADY PLAYED IT 20984290 TIMES AND I REALLY FEEL BAD ABOUT IT LIKE I FEEL REaLLY REALLY BAD I DON'T WANT TO MAKE ANYONE ANNOYED OR HATE THE SONGS BECAUSE IT's GOTTEN SO OLD TO THEM waht the frick do i do what do i do This music has to do with my current big obsession so even if i find other music i like i never like it nearly as much as the music related to my obsession so i just go back to That music frick firkfcikrffrii rikckiirkfikrccikrrik whatever man my question Was going to be "how do i avoid feeling bad about playing the same songs over and over" but the solution is to just not play those songs ... even though i want to the stupid fear mixed with embarrassment is overpowering so,

     you'll just have to decide which you like more, the songs or fear

     ... heh .. i guess you can still answer it if you want to, or if you have a different solution. i don't know, i feel bad. this is really pointless fughfdgjidfgdggggggg

     if you need more time with that certain material spend more time with it. maybe even explore the same material in a way you haven't yet. a different obsession may occur to you at some point later but probably not quite yet

8.29.18  6:25 pm   8.29.18  2:49 am   ive tried doing this, like writing poetry and stuff, but it hasn't worked out any better ...

     how about writing something that is not technically poetry and stuff

     i think my problem is lack of a subject. i could write about something stupid and near meaningless and itd be easier but that doesn't really seem fun to me

     spend 2 days trying to think of a 'meaningful' 'subject' then after that if you can't think of anything try writing about absolutely everything. that is, if you want to do this bad enough to still want to do it on the 3rd day

8.29.18  5:29 pm   what's a word that you thought meant one thing but actually meant something completely different

     existentialism. actually happened twice, i thought it meant something then i found out it meant something else but now i think it's starting to mean what i thought it meant all along

8.29.18  5:16 pm   bro what is up with all these 15 year olds going to you for help with their messed up mental problems

     oh you should see the problems adults have

8.29.18  4:39 pm   what kind of keyboard would you recommend to buy on a very low budget? it's gotta have hammer action, thats the biggest priority. a midi controller is cheaper than a digital piano but it doesnt have 88 keys

     88 keys is even too much for your mind and don't even try to carry it

      and i dont really know how to use them (i dont know about musical softwares).

     you don't need to, as long as you can pick a sound you like and keep it there

      do i need 88 keys (i dont think i can play classical music on a 2 octave keyboard but it might be enough for other styles.

     too octaves way too few, but 5 octaves may be just right. befriend the octave switcher button, should be right there on the front. but with 5 octaves you won't need to even use that button very much where as with a 2 octave keyboard let's face it you will be one a one handed player because the other hand will be on the octave button the whole time and good luck playing in B

      i havent been playing for almost a year because i dont have the funds for a digital piano so i gotta find something buyable. right now i have this toyish keyboard thing that has no hammer action and when you play chords and melody at the same time it makes weird noises instead of playing what you play.

     at the usual time

maybe people don't like jazz harmony

8.29.18  12:05 pm   8.28.18  5:06 pm i know i have.

besides, it'd be good editing practice.
